tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am delighted to share my experience with Dr. Sarath, who provided exceptional care for my son's Invisalign braces. As a parent, I understand how daunting dental visits can be for children, especially if they have any fear or anxiety. However, Dr. Sarath completely transformed my son's perception of dentistry.

First and foremost, Dr. Sarath exhibited a remarkable level of professionalism throughout the entire process. From our initial consultation to the completion of my son's Invisalign treatment, the doctor displayed a diligent and meticulous approach. My son felt at ease under his care, and this made a tremendous difference in the overall experience.

One of the qualities that stood out the most was Dr. Sarath's ability to make my son feel comfortable during his visits. With a gentle and empathetic demeanor, the doctor patiently explained each step of the Invisalign process to my son, ensuring he understood everything thoroughly. This personalized approach helped alleviate my son's anxieties and fostered a sense of trust between them.

Dr. Sarath's professional attitude was evident in every aspect of his work. He consistently displayed a high level of competence and expertise, delivering meticulous and precise treatment. It was clear that he genuinely cared about the outcome and well-being of his patients, which made us feel confident in his capabilities.

Moreover, Dr. Sarath went above and beyond in terms of his communication with both myself and my son. He patiently listened to our concerns, answered all of our questions, and provided valuable guidance throughout the entire process. This level of attentiveness and patient care ensured that we were well-informed and actively involved in the treatment journey.

In conclusion, I highly recommend Dr. Sarath for Invisalign braces. His polite and accommodating nature, along with his dedication and professionalism, created a positive experience for my son. Thanks to his diligent work, my son's fear of dental visits has been replaced with confidence and comfort. We are grateful to have found such a fantastic dentist who genuinely cares for his patients' well-being.
reply_text: Glad that you took time to write about the treatment and me as well.... He became very co-operative too in the further sittings... Hope he had a positive dental experience:)

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visiting the doctor since 2010.  Me & my wife are comfortable with him & his assistants. We are very happy.

tags: Value for money,
review:
went to show a TMJ pain. The place is quite crammed.. inside a residential building in a first floor.. such a narrow staircase .. no appropriate lighting .. not the right place for a clinic.. 
It was very hot inside , I was sweating.. .. doctor should have the curtsy to atleast have a proper ambience for patient.. had to request him multiple times to put on the fan.. finally the fan was switched on. 
He prescribed a dental scan. While on this, i had to do some small tooth fillings proactively, ****** ***** *** ** ***********.. It took me less than 5 minutes for the filling.. for 2 teeth. and there came the bill for 2,400 for the tooth filling,,, it was a shocker.. a clinic with a shoddy ambience charging 2400 for a tooth filling which took less than 5 minutes.*  ** *** **** ******** ****** , ********* * ***** ****** *** ****** ** ****** *** ******** ** **** *** ******** **** ******** **** ******* *** ** ******** **** **** ******** ******* ******* ** ** *** ** ****** **** ** *** ** *** ***** * *** ********** ** * ** ** **** ******* ****** ** ********* **** ****** *** ***** ****** ** *** *** **** **** ****** ** ************* ******* **** **** ********** ********* ****** ** ******* **** *********
